titles.title: A resolution recognizing the contributions of Project Chernobyl and Project 9/11.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary: 11/7/2011--Introduced. Commends Project 9/11 and its work to assist the 9/11 community in early treatment and detection of thyroid cancer.
